entry.title: 5 Things You Should Know Before Hiring an SEO Consultant
entry.summary: If you want to hire an SEO consultant, there are a few things you should know first In this blog post, we’ll cover the SEO consulting process, what qualities to look for in a good consultant, and how to price an SEO project and do…

entry.title: Google announces new update that targets bad content
entry.summary: Google's official blog announced this afternoon that it has started a new algorithm update for its search engine, with a focus on content quality. In Google's blog post, it says that: Update starts next week and should take two weeks to finish completely. The objective…
